short_summary: INVITATION TO QUALIFY - Port Morien Inner Shoreline Repairs
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 19, 2023 at 14:00EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
